name: Gravity Slingshot
description:
Use the forces of gravity to guide the astronaut home! This game is my entry to GMTK 2020 Theme: Out of Control

This was my first game jam ever and the second game I've made, so was only able to make a few tutorial levels. But thank you for trying it out!

Credits:

Graphics were obtained under CC license: https://opengameart.org/content/space-pixel-art
